name: Rallye
overview: Rallye is a single-player motorcycle racing game published by Brillant Software in 1985 and released in Italy as Desert Race in Peek n.15 (marzo 1986). You have to face a grueling motorcycle race in the African desert. The raid is divided into four stages, each of which is covered only if the previous one has been completed within the time limit of five minutes. Be careful not to hit thee boulders scattered along the road, otherwise you will lose precious seconds. You can choose between three difficulty levels, plus one for driving training, in which there are no opponents crowding you. The joystick allws you to control the speed and trajectory of the bike. Up to accelerate, down to brake, left and right steer in that direction and fire to throttle shift.
